content: super cute baby rib hat with pom-pom for newborn to 1 year-old or more this ribbed hat is knitted in round using a machine washable acrylic by lion brand i choose this denim jean color for a baby boy this hat is for a newborn and it can probably stretch up to fit to a year old the yarn is nice soft and stretchy it is easy to knit hope you give it a try thanks ratcha chambers
